meanings.sent1: The unleaded pencil was safe for children to use.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to drink unleaded water for her health.
meanings.sent3: The unleaded toy car was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and unleaded as the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The unleaded sky was a clear blue canvas above us.

meanings.definition: Referring to gasoline without added lead
meanings.sent1: The mechanic recommended using unleaded fuel for the car.
meanings.sent2: They decided to fill up the car with unleaded gas at the station.
meanings.sent3: The unleaded gas station sign made her chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His words were like unleaded fuel, igniting her passion.
meanings.sent5: The car purred happily on the unleaded road ahead.

meanings.sent1: The unleaded soil was perfect for growing organic vegetables.
meanings.sent2: They chose the unleaded paint to avoid any toxic exposure.
meanings.sent3: The unleaded garden gnome brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as pure and unleaded as a bubbling brook.
meanings.sent5: The unleaded air in the forest was crisp and refreshing.
